document_data.caption: A map showing Raven Street in central Zhentil Keep.
document_data.name: Raven Street
document_data.starts: The wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]
document_data.ends: The wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Harbor District|Harbor District]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Raven Street''' was a road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Located in the [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]] in central Zhentil Keep, Raven Street cut north to south to touch both the northern wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]] and southern wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Harbor District|Harbor District]]. Along the way Raven Street crossed [[Elephstron Way]].
